page.title: 13HEALTH CARE IN TARBERT
page.content: There are two doctors in Tarbert.One is permanent and the other replacement doctors in practice occupy the other job. DR Robertson,the permanent doctor,travels round other places too. The most common illness in Harris he treats is upper respiratory tract infections,and the most serious illness he had to deal with was cancer.The medical supplies come from Glasgow and Stornoway. The hours he works are flexible{ because he has to travel out to patients who cannot get transport to Tarbert to his surgery.He also has to consult up in Harris House in some evenings. The district nurse helps the doctor by doing the routine calls,changing dressings and doing checkups in schools.
